name: Character Overview Guide
desc:
The building guides for this Event Wish's drop-boosted characters are out! Let's take a look together~

The guides contain the characters' basic information, equipment tips, material harvest routes, and everything else you need to turn them into absolute powerhouses!

customize.name: Ineffa
customize.desc: A multifunctional robot containing integrated mechanical components from various nations. The Source Core in her chest has endured the passage of countless years.

customize.text: A multifunctional robot containing integrated mechanical components from various nations. The Source Core in her chest has endured the passage of countless years.

customize.name: Citlali
customize.desc: The great shaman from the Masters of the Night-Wind, the universally-revered Granny Itztli.

customize.text: The great shaman from the Masters of the Night-Wind, the universally-revered Granny Itztli.
<color=#ffffff>⭐⭐⭐⭐</color>

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

customize.text: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

customize.name: Sethos
customize.desc: The Temple of Silence's heir. Burdened with secrets, he comes from the sands.

customize.text: The Temple of Silence's heir. Burdened with secrets, he comes from the sands.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

customize.text: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

customize.name: Skirk
customize.desc: A visitor who once appeared in an Abyssal rift and the Primordial Sea, this solitary warrior mentored Tartaglia in the martial arts.

customize.text: A visitor who once appeared in an Abyssal rift and the Primordial Sea, this solitary warrior mentored Tartaglia in the martial arts.

customize.name: Shenhe
customize.desc: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.

customize.text: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.
<color=#ffffff>⭐⭐⭐⭐</color>

customize.name: Dahlia
customize.desc: Deacon of the Church of Favonius and the Anemo Archon's representative in the church.

customize.text: Deacon of the Church of Favonius and the Anemo Archon's representative in the church.

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.text: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.name: Candace
customize.desc: A descendant of King Deshret with an amber left eye. The defender of Aaru Village.

customize.text: A descendant of King Deshret with an amber left eye. The defender of Aaru Village.

customize.name: Escoffier
customize.desc: The ex-head chef of Hotel Debord, renowned throughout Fontaine as the Patissiere Supreme and vanguard of precision gastronomy. Has incomparably strict standards when it comes to cooking.

customize.text: The ex-head chef of Hotel Debord, renowned throughout Fontaine as the Patissiere Supreme and vanguard of precision gastronomy. Has incomparably strict standards when it comes to cooking.

customize.name: Navia
customize.desc: The current President of Spina di Rosula, who is lovely, dutiful, and a great boss.

customize.text: The current President of Spina di Rosula, who is lovely, dutiful, and a great boss.
<color=#ffffff>⭐⭐⭐⭐</color>

customize.name: Ifa
customize.desc: A vet from the Flower-Feather Clan who cherishes the life he leads alongside all manner of living things — people, animals, you name it.

customize.text: A vet from the Flower-Feather Clan who cherishes the life he leads alongside all manner of living things — people, animals, you name it.

customize.name: Ororon
customize.desc: A young man from the Masters of the Night-Wind who instead lives in the wild alongside all manner of life.

customize.text: A young man from the Masters of the Night-Wind who instead lives in the wild alongside all manner of life.

customize.name: Layla
customize.desc: A Rtawahist student who specializes in Theoretical Astrology. Heavily prone to somnambulism and locked in a grinding war with sleep deprivation, the problem of restful slumber is a most troubling one to her.

customize.text: A Rtawahist student who specializes in Theoretical Astrology. Heavily prone to somnambulism and locked in a grinding war with sleep deprivation, the problem of restful slumber is a most troubling one to her.

customize.name: Varesa
customize.desc: A laid-back orchard manager and warrior of the Collective of Plenty. An aspiring hero who hungers for justice... and lots and lots of food!

customize.text: A laid-back orchard manager and warrior of the Collective of Plenty. An aspiring hero who hungers for justice... and lots and lots of food!

customize.name: Xianyun
customize.desc: One of the Mighty and Illuminated Adepti of Jueyun, known as "Cloud Retainer." Expert in all kinds of mechanical contraptions, her heart now turns towards the affairs of the mortal world, through which she walks under the name "Xianyun."

customize.text: One of the Mighty and Illuminated Adepti of Jueyun, known as "Cloud Retainer." Expert in all kinds of mechanical contraptions, her heart now turns towards the affairs of the mortal world, through which she walks under the name "Xianyun."
<color=#ffffff>⭐⭐⭐⭐</color>

customize.name: Iansan
customize.desc: Head coach of the fitness club at the Collective of Plenty, and a renowned Natlanese nutritionist.

customize.text: Head coach of the fitness club at the Collective of Plenty, and a renowned Natlanese nutritionist.

customize.name: Gaming
customize.desc: Guard of the Sword and Strongbox Secure Transport Agency, and the head of the "Mighty Mythical Beasts" Wushou troupe.

customize.text: Guard of the Sword and Strongbox Secure Transport Agency, and the head of the "Mighty Mythical Beasts" Wushou troupe.

customize.name: Chevreuse
customize.desc: The captain of the Special Security and Surveillance Patrol, who wears justice as an ever-present seal upon her heart. Her musket shall only ever point at the guilty.

customize.text: The captain of the Special Security and Surveillance Patrol, who wears justice as an ever-present seal upon her heart. Her musket shall only ever point at the guilty.

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

customize.text: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

customize.name: Wriothesley
customize.desc: Duke of the Fortress of Meropide, Lord Incognito of the murky depths.

customize.text: Duke of the Fortress of Meropide, Lord Incognito of the murky depths
<color=#ffffff>⭐⭐⭐⭐</color>

customize.name: Charlotte
customize.desc: Reporter of The Steambird

customize.text: Reporter of The Steambird

customize.name: Mika
customize.desc: A young knight born to an ordinary family. He serves as a Front-Line Surveyor in his Company. He is a low-key and cautious character.

customize.text: A young knight born to an ordinary family. He serves as a Front-Line Surveyor in his Company. He is a low-key and cautious character.

customize.name: Chongyun
customize.desc: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

customize.text: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

customize.name: Yumemizuki Mizuki
customize.desc: A shareholder of Aisa Bathhouse, a baku, and a clinical psychologist. Dedicated to the dispersal of nightmares, and to bringing people peace of mind.

customize.text: A shareholder of Aisa Bathhouse, a baku, and a clinical psychologist. Dedicated to the dispersal of nightmares, and to bringing people peace of mind.

customize.name: Sigewinne
customize.desc: A Melusine and the Fortress of Meropide's head nurse. She cares equally for every convict locked in the undersea prison.

customize.text: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

customize.name: Gorou
customize.desc: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

customize.text: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

customize.name: Xiangling
customize.desc: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

customize.text: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

customize.name: Arlecchino
customize.desc: "The Knave," Fourth of the Fatui Harbingers. A poised, ruthless diplomat. To the children in the House of the Hearth, she is their feared yet dependable "Father."

customize.text: "The Knave," Fourth of the Fatui Harbingers. A poised, ruthless diplomat. To the children in the House of the Hearth, she is their feared yet dependable "Father."

customize.desc: A rattan weaver from Chenyu Vale. Clear-minded and well-tempered, she is as lively as a mountain spring.

customize.text: Master Rattan Weaver of the Chenyu Vale Artisans Association.
